original_text: Naomi received news from Judah that the Lord had helped his people. There was now enough food in Judah again. So Naomi decided to leave Moab and return to Judah with Ruth and Orpah.
korean_text: 그 여인이 모압 지방에서 여호와께서 자기 백성을 돌보시사 그들에게 양식을 주셨다 함을 듣고 이에 두 며느리와 함께 일어나 모압 지방에서 돌아오려 하여

sentences.original_text: that the Lord had helped his people
There was now enough food in Judah again
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 유다에 다시 충분한 음식이 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: So Naomi decided to leave Moab
